name: Escape From Spirits 1
description:
These maps is looks like a mazes, and these mazes are loaded with a lot of Spirit, you are need to escape from the mazes

Going to the exit without get attacked by a Spirits.

 When you are can escape from the Spirits, YOU ARE A WINNER.    

Try to not get attacked by a Spirits.

Have a good game, and hope you enjoy that game
